sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>This fix script is part of DEF0210873, W</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var sysTrigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger"); sysTrigger.addEncodedQuery('name=Flow Engine Interactive Event Handler^ORname=Flow Engine Event Handler^system_id=ACTIVE NODES'); sysTrigger.system_id = 'ALL NODES'; sysTrigger.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-18 22:05:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>deb8ee0cc7503010b59949f988c2609b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove flow designer ACTIVE NODES jobs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer - Flow Engine" source="com.glide.hub.flow_engine">5ce9b4683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fda</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_deb8ee0cc7503010b59949f988c2609b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-18 22:05:49</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: This fix script is part of DEF0210873, W
